title: With Paul, Cruz and Clinton On The Verge, 2016 Election Takes Shape
teaser: Sens. Rand Paul and Ted Cruz have announced they'll run for president, and Hillary Clinton is expected to announce on Sunday. Correspondents Mara Liasson and Don Gonyea join NPR's Tamara Keith.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
